metadata.name: 0xLOVEGAMES_A
metadata.description: Just me & you, lost in our own reality. Enveloped in an immersive state, temporarily breathing new life into the world around us. It's the moments like these that I hold so close. Moments where life feels simple and the only limit to our exploration is our imagination. The physicality of our surrounds truly don't matter, as long as I'm with you.
